page.title: 07A TEENAGER IN KEMBERTON
page.content: Louise McGrath is a 15 year old girl who lives in Kemberton. On weekdays she has to travel to school on a special bus and the journey takes half an hour. She does not often go out in the evenings because there is not much to do in Kemberton. There used to be a youth club in the village hall but it closed down recently. One night a week she plays squash at the Tennis and Racket club in Shifnal and another night she goes to Judo in the school gym. Louise plays the guitar and is a member of a folk group which has performed in a number of concerts. On Saturdays she either plays tennis or goes shopping, often to Bridgnorth. On Sundays she usually stays at home.
